data.text: Kuno kwe kwolesebwa Katonda kwe yalaga Nakkumu, Omwerukoosi okukwata ku bibambulira ebyali bijjira Nineeve.
Katonda wa buggya era Mukama awalana eggwanga.
Mukama tatera kusunguwala, ate nga wa maanyi mangi
Ensozi zikankanira mu maaso ga Katonda,
Ani ayinza okuyimirira mu maaso ge ng’asunguwadde?
Naye alisaanyaawo abalabe be mu mataba amazibu,
Kaakano nzija kumenya ekikoligo kyabwe nkibaggyeko
Kino Mukama ky’alagidde ekikwata ku Nineeve:
Yimusa amaaso, tunula ku nsozi, laba,
